hero.title: Case studies
hero.text:
This page is not a comprehensive portfolio, nor is it a design showcase: this is a place for me to dive into some aspects of my projects that I find to be worth talking about. It will probably become home to my more technical projects, so while I will do my best to articulate what I'm talking about, do note there may be some prerequisite knowledge for some things, or I may spew nonsense (I'll try to avoid the latter).
If you are interested in a more regularly-updated and shorter form of my case studies, I make an effort to regularly post my adventures on Threads. Topics that I see as especially interesting will make their way here.
